Package com.travelbank.knit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KnitInterface
    Base interface for Knit class.
    KnitUser
    Created by omerozer on 2/5/18.
    MemoryEntity
    All internal components of Knit such as InternalModel & InternalPresenter extend this class.
    MessageReceiver
    Knit components that receive messages in the form of KnitMessage implement this.
    ModelInterface
    Base class that provides callbacks to all Models.
    ModelMapInterface
    When KnitProcessor scans classpath, it creates a class called ModelMap that implements ModelMapInterface.
    NativeViewCallbacks
    Callback interface that provides KnitPresenter with callback methods from a native Android Activity.
    Poolable
    Objects that can be re-used without being destroyed and recreated can implement Poolable.
    PresenterInterface
    Provides methods that handle Presenter specific functionality.
    ViewToPresenterMapInterface
    When KnitProcessor scans classpath, it creates a class called ViewToPresenterMap that implements ViewToPresenterMapInterface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidView  
    AndroidViewUtility
    Utility class that extracts certain Android native components out of view objects and starts fragments.
    AttachmentMap
    This object handles all live attachment mappings for a particular view object.
    EntityInstance<T extends MemoryEntity>
    Container class for all MemoryEntity instances registered to UsageGraph.
    InternalModel
    This class is the master class of KnitModel that is exposed to the user.
    InternalPresenter
    This class is the master class of KnitPresenter that is exposed to the user.
    Knit
    Main instance of Knit framework.
    KnitAppListener
    This is used internally by Knit to listen for activity lifecycle events and handle them accordingly.
    KnitMessage
    Carrier object for inter-presenter objects.
    KnitModel
    Model classes that are exposed to the developer by Knit.
    KnitNavigator
    Class that handles Navigation accross all views.
    KnitPresenter<T,I>
    Presenter classes that are exposed to the developer by Knit.
    KnitResponse<A>
    This class wraps the body of a generated response type or an error from a KnitModel.
    MemoryPool<T extends Poolable>
    A pool of objects that can be reset instead of being destroyed and recreated to reduce allocation overhead.
    MessagePool
    MemoryPool for messages that get sent from one KnitPresenter to another.
    MessageTrain
    This class holds KnitMessages for a target View.
    ViewEvents
    A hub for all view events.
